tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CyberbullyingEvidence (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  victim_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  bully_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  evidence_details TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE CyberbullyingIncidents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date TIMESTAMP,
    description TEXT,
    evidence_url VARCHAR(255),
    reported_by VARCHAR(50)
);
CREATE TABLE CyberbullyingUsers (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    role VARCHAR(20),
    last_login TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE CyberbullyingIncidents (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  victim_name VARCHAR(255),
  bully_name VARCHAR(255),
  incident_date DATE,
  evidence TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ActionsTaken (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id INT,
  action_date DATE,
  action_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES CyberbullyingIncidents(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Evidence (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   incident_date DATE,
   victim_name VARCHAR(50),
   bully_name VARCHAR(50),
   description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Attachments (
   attachment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   evidence_id INT,
   attachment_url TEXT,
   FOREIGN KEY(evidence_id) REFERENCES Evidence(id)
)

CREATE TABLE Comments (
   comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   evidence_id INT,
   comment TEXT,
   commenter_name VARCHAR(50),
   FOREIGN KEY(evidence_id) REFERENCES Evidence(id)
)

CREATE TABLE Tags (
   tag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   evidence_id INT,
   tag_name VARCHAR(50),
   FOREIGN KEY(evidence_id) REFERENCES Evidence(id)
)

CREATE TABLE cyberbullying_reports (
    report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    reporter_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    report_date DATE NOT NULL,
    incident_description TEXT,
    evidence_image BYTEA
);
